title: San Diego/North
name: Courtyard by Marriott San Diego Sorrento Mesa/La Jolla

reviews.content: Price - US $250, double Cleanliness - excellent. Quietness - very good. Comfort - very good. Location - excellent. Friendliness - excellent. Breakfast - none. Classiness - fantastic history. Room included - shower, bath, TV - no coffee making. Big room and lots of pools.
reviews.author: Obie Okuneva

description: New state-of-the-art hotel with fresh, healthy food options and Starbucks coffee. Complimentary WiFi.
